us-ar.name: US-AR
us-ar.description: Mobile application for evaluating usability in augmented reality systems. Final degree project focused on interaction and testing in real-world contexts.

reactive.name: Reactive
reactive.description: Virtual reality application with remote control via WebRTC, designed to support pediatric patients with hospital delirium. Final master's project developed in collaboration with La Paz University Hospital, U-TAD, and several fellow master's students.
